summary: This is a brief email from Jeffrey Epstein to attorney Roy Black, forwarding an attached letter for review. The email indicates communication between Epstein and his legal counsel regarding case matters.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: Addressed in an email from Jeffrey Epstein, who asks him to review an attached letter, indicating he is providing legal counsel or representation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Sender of the email to his attorney Roy Black, forwarding a letter for legal review.

connections.description: Epstein emails Black to review an attached legal letter, indicating Black is providing legal services to Epstein.

events.title: Epstein forwards letter to attorney
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein sends an email to his attorney Roy Black, asking him to review an attached letter.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in direct communication with his defense attorney Roy Black in November 2008.
The email shows Epstein actively managing his legal defense by forwarding documents for attorney review.
The attached file '081124 Villafana Itr to Black.pdf' suggests correspondence involving another party (Villafana) was part of the legal matter.
